thread.title: Karen Elliott Shelton
thread.title_full: Save On Energy reviewed by Karen Elliott Shelton

author: Karen Elliott Shelton
title: Karen Elliott Shelton
text: I called in yesterday hoping I could find an electric company that I didn't have to put a deposit down. The gentleman I spoke with was very helpful, patient and knowledgeable. Not only did I not have to put a deposit down, he was able to get me a low fixed rate as well. I am now able to cancel my service with Ambit Energy which is the worst provider. Thank you for your help in me achieving the cancellation with Ambit.
